description: This trap indicates that the Extended Control
Processor (ECP) has change operating state.

event.Summary: Operating state of ECP in $v1 changed to $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-TCM-MIB::ecpOperatingModeChange Fore-TCM-MIB::ecpBoardIndex i 1 Fore-TCM-MIB::ecpOperatingStatus i 1 Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex i 9999

description: This is the Extended Control Processor board index
within the management station.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::ecpBoardIndex

description: This is the software status of this Extended
Control Processor (ECP).
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::ecpOperatingStatus

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex

description: This trap is generated whenever the External Synchronization
Interface (ESI) timing source (esiCurrentTimingRef) is changed
either manually or by the system due to failure detection.

event.Summary: ESI current timing reference $v2 source changed to $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-TCM-MIB::esiTimingSourceChange Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCardIndex i 1 Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCurrentTimingRef i 1 Fore-TCM-MIB::esiRefSource i 1 Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex i 9999

description: This is the index for this External Synchronization
Interface (ESI) card.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCardIndex

description: This is the current timing reference in use for this
External Synchronization Interface (ESI) card.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCurrentTimingRef

description: This is the timing reference source index for the
External Synchronization Interface (ESI) card.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::esiRefSource

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex

description: This trap is generated whenever the External Synchronization
Interface (ESI) timing source (esiCurrentTimingRef) fails.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-TCM-MIB::esiTimingSourceFailed Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCardIndex i 1 Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCurrentTimingRef i 1 Fore-TCM-MIB::esiRefSource i 1 Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex i 9999

description: This is the index for this External Synchronization
Interface (ESI) card.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCardIndex

description: This is the current timing reference in use for this
External Synchronization Interface (ESI) card.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::esiCurrentTimingRef

description: This is the timing reference source index for the
External Synchronization Interface (ESI) card.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::esiRefSource

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex

description: This trap is generated whenever the Standby Timing Control
Module (TCM) appears to haved failed. This is determined by
lack of response from it.
This is the Extended Control Processor board index
within the management station.
variables.name: Fore-TCM-MIB::ecpBoardIndex

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex
